text:
karOqtyathOq saM Ba#ratyEqvainaqM ~Myadaba#ddhama-vadaqddhyAd-garBA$H praqjAnA$M parAqpAtu#kAH syurbaqddhamava# dadhAtiq garBA#NAqM dhRutyai# niShTaqrkya#M baddhnAti praqjAnA$M praqjana#nAyaq vAgvA EqShA yath sO#maqkraya#NIq jUraqsItyA#haq yaddhi mana#sAq java#tEq tad-vAqcA vada#ti dhRuqtA manaqsEtyA#haq mana#sAq hi 
vAgdhRuqtA juShTAq viShNa#vaq ityA#ha - [  ] 47
